caption.title: Changes in temperature limitation.
caption.p:
a , The slope of the relationship between 95 th percentile ( F 95) of the maximum annual fraction of absorbed photosynthetically active radiation ( F max) and the summer warmth index (SWI 5).
b , The intercept of the relationship between F 95 and SWI 5. Error bars represent 95% confidence intervals. The red dashed lines show fitted linear regressions, with slope m (
a , % °SWI 5 −1 yr −1;
b , % yr −1) and statistical significance p.
